vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὑστέρ-ημα, ατος, τό,
shortcoming, deficiency, need, [LXX+NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: what is lacking; poverty; what is needed deficiency
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
what is lacking; poverty; what is needed deficiency
a shortcoming, defect;, personal shortcoming, what is lacking, what is needed 1Cor. 16:17; Phil. 2:30; Col. 1:24; 1Thess. 3:10; want, need, poverty, penury, Lk. 21:4; 2Cor. 8:14; 9:12; 11:9*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: lo que hace falta, necesidad ; ausencia (de una persona) ; pobreza (LUC.21:4)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 缺乏, 需求
2) 缺點, 不足 (帖前 3:10)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 缺乏, 需求
2) 缺点, 不足 (帖前 3:10)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: những gì còn thiếu (cần thiết, tài nguyên...)
